alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:01PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hamilton County through 345 PM EDT... At 300 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Brown Tract Pond Campground, or 20 miles northeast of Old Forge, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Forked Lake Public Campground, Lake Eaton Campground, Long Lake, Nehasane, Partlow, Robinwood, Little Tupper Lake, Lake Lila, Catlin Lake and Deerland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
